cast.name: 莫贾娜·埃尔阿劳维 Morjana El Alaoui

awards:
第70届威尼斯电影节(2013)
　　人权电影网络奖-特别提及 肖恩·格莱特
　　欧洲电影联盟奖 威尼斯日最佳影片(提名) 肖恩·格莱特
introduction: Malika´s double life as a call-centre operator by day and the uninhibited leader of a punk-rock band in Tangiers´ ancient casbah by night takes an unexpected turn when the young woman has to find the money to direct a music video that will be her band´s ticket to fame and fortune. Unfortunately, Malika looks in all the wrong places and finds herself definitely out of her depth; she´s going to need to rely on much more than her talent and her femininity to get herself out of this mess. Splendid debut by a young American actor and producer (a revelation in the first "short" by his best buddy Darren Aronofsky) who has lived in Tangiers for years, this is a heart-stopping thriller that reveals all the contradictions of Moroccan culture today. All the songs in the film are sung by its star Chaimae Ben Acha
